steps.title: Exterior overview
steps.copy: Atucha II is a vertical heavy-water reactor (PHWR).

steps.title: Containment & turbine hall
steps.copy: Containment assures layers of protection; the turbine hall converts steam to power.

steps.title: Reactor vessel (RPV)
steps.copy: Vertical pressure vessel with on‑power refueling.

steps.title: Channels & fuel
steps.copy: ≈451 channels with natural‑UO₂ bundles in a hex lattice.

steps.title: Moderator & coolant
steps.copy: Heavy water moderates and cools; neutron economy enables natural fuel.

steps.title: Primary loops & steam generators
steps.copy: Two loops move heat to steam generators; separate moderator cooling.

steps.title: Control rods & shutdown
steps.copy: Reactivity control with rapid insertion and redundancy.

steps.title: Control room
steps.copy: Consoles, mimic panels, and operator workflows; simulator training.

steps.title: Visit in person
steps.copy: Ready to see it for real? Plan your visit.
